content.arrabic: نَوَيْتُ صَوْمَ غَدٍ عَنْ أَدَاءِ سُنَّةِ يَوْمِ عَرَفَةَ لِلّٰهِ تَعَالَى
content.latin: Nawaitu shauma ghadin ‘an adâ’i sunnati Arafah lillâhi ta‘âlâ.

translation.id: Aku berniat puasa sunnah Arafah esok hari karena Allah ta’âlâ.
translation.en: I intend to perform the sunnah fast of Arafah tomorrow for the sake of Allah Ta‘âlâ.
